caption: In the canyon, there was a tall tower where a girl with extremely long hair lived. Her mother called her from below, and the girl used her hair to pull her mother up. Together, they stood in front of a mirror. Later, the mother sat in a chair, chatting with her daughter. She closed all the windows in the room. The following scenes were presented in an animated opera style. The daughter and mother sang and danced, conveying the plot. Eventually, the mother had to leave, and the daughter used her hair to lower her back to the ground. Meanwhile, the three fugitives from the beginning of the film had escaped into a forest but were soon pursued and caught by the horse-riding soldiers.
